Details

This type is for NPC-initiated conversations. It's not a normal conversational action, since it doesn't involve handling a player command, but is usually instead triggered by an agenda item, takeTurn(), or other background activity. **`initiateConvType`**` :   `[`ConvType`](../object/ConvType.html)
